de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.transform.framenet

Class FNConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.transform.framenet.FNConverter

  • public class FNConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Instance of this class converts FrameNet 1.5 to LMF-format
    Author:
    Zijad Maksuti, Silvana Hartmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FNConverter(de.saar.coli.salsa.reiter.framenet.FrameNet frameNet, LexicalResource lexicalResource, java.lang.String dtd_version)
      Constructs a FNConverter based on the consumed parameters

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LexicalResource getLexicalResource()
      Returns the LexicalResource object, which contains the results of the conversion
      void toLMF()
      Converts the informations provided by the initialized FrameNet object to LMF-format.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FNConverter

        public FNConverter(de.saar.coli.salsa.reiter.framenet.FrameNet frameNet,
           LexicalResource lexicalResource,
           java.lang.String dtd_version)
        Constructs a FNConverter based on the consumed parameters
        Parameters:
        frameNet - initialized FrameNet object
        lexicalResource - initialized object of LexicalResource, which will be filled with FrameNet's data
        dtd_version - specifies the version of the .dtd which will be written to lexicalResource

    • Method Detail

      • toLMF

        public void toLMF()
        Converts the informations provided by the initialized FrameNet object to LMF-format.
        The result of the conversion can be obtained by calling getLexicalResource()

      • getLexicalResource

        public LexicalResource getLexicalResource()
        Returns the LexicalResource object, which contains the results of the conversion
        Returns:
        the lexicalResource
